summary.Treatment: Tab ZODON Plus (1 Morning, 1 Night), Tab Qubipin 200mg (1 Night), Tab Ativan (Lorazepam) 2mg (1 Night), Rivotril 0.5mg (Clonazepam) (1 Night), SERTA 50mg (1 Night), Continue Olba BPls ugen medicines.
